name: .JBI File Extension
summary: Learn about .JBI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Job file created by Motoman robot programming software; contains instructions for motion and other actions that control the robot; can be programmed and simulated offline and then uploaded to the robot's job database.

content: Motoman software is primarily used in industrial settings, but also in academic environments to teach robot programming. Motoman robots can be used for tasks such as assembly, handling, machine tending, packaging, palletizing, painting, and welding.
NOTE: Motoman is a Yaskawa company.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
